# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)

- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel.

### Errors when using entities without ingredients
- Ensure that entities have the necessary ingredients before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are not missing ingredients.

### Errors when using entities that are not connected to the electric network
- Ensure that entities are connected to the electric network before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are plugged into the electric network.

### Errors when using entities that are not working
- Ensure that entities are working before using them.
- Check the status of entities to ensure they are in a working state.

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
